sources.name: empdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdataset

sources.name: deptdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdataset

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared empdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared deptdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/department.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = empdataset,
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(Source, {"Department"}, {{"totalemployees", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Grouped rows", {"Department"}, deptdataset, {"deptid"}, "deptdataset", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded deptdataset" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "deptdataset", {"deptid", " deptname"}, {"deptdataset.deptid", "deptdataset. deptname"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Expanded deptdataset", {"deptdataset.deptid", "deptdataset. deptname", "Department", "totalemployees"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"Department", "deptdataset.deptid"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
